attributes.action: The minister of the environment Owen Patterson is unfit to hold the position
attributes.additional_details: We demand that Owen Patterson is replaced as environment minister. His handling of the recent floods has been a complete fiasco. Additionally, his promotion of a Badger Cull and support of hunting with dogs is wholly unacceptable in modern society. Added to which is his arrogant dismissive ineffective attitude to those who have flood damage is indicative of a person unsuited to such an important position.
